org.jogger.http.servlet
Class ServletResponse

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.http.servlet.ServletResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Response
public class ServletResponse
extends Object
implements Response

A Response implementation based on the Servlet API.

Author:
German Escobar

render

public Response render(String templateName,
                       Map<String,Object> atts)
                throws HttpException
Description copied from interface: Response
Renders the specified template with the specified attributes (and those already in the response). If an attribute with the same name already exists in the response it will be overriden.

Specified by:
render in interface Response
Parameters:
templateName - the name of the template to be rendered.
atts - a map of attributes to be passed to the view.

itself for method chaining.
